title: Idem iterum, or, The history of Q. Mary's big-belly from Mr. Fox's Acts and monuments and Dr. Heylin's Hist. res.
author: Foxe, John, 1516-1587. Actes and monuments.
notes: Place and date of publication from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
A letter to the Bishop of London, closing on p. 2, is dated 1554.
Item at reel 1632:66 identified as Wing F2040 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
